Articles.Content:
I fly over your hill and drop paratroopers to take it. I then make an airbase on it.

My hill.
I blow up your airbase using conventional weapons and claim my ashes.

The ashes blow away in the wind.

No one's scorched hill.

I send out my entire naval fleet to protect out planets waters.

My fleet/Our Planet

The fleet flagman has caught the hill by its bottom and sinks, The fleet retires.

Independent underwater hill.

I call in my armada of submarines and blow the bejeezus out of your hill, and the grand fleet comes back to patrol the high seas.

Our planet, and my grand Navy.

> 
> 
> 12 minutes ago, DarkOwl57 said:
> 
> 
> I call in my armada of submarines and blow the bejeezus out of your hill, and the grand fleet comes back to patrol the high seas.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Our planet, and my grand Navy.
> 

But, but, the hill is inland...

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, Spacetraindriver said:
> 
> 
> But, but, the hill is inland...
> 

Cruise missiles bro!
Ahh ok, your hill.

> 
> 
> Just now, Spacetraindriver said:
> 
> 
> Ahh ok, your hill.
> 

Our planet!

I decide to kill all of you and put a 1,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 megaton nuclear bomb at the core of the planet, destroying it in an epic explosion and blasting all of the debris into he far reaches of the best known universe.

Will everyone stop using nukes? We just got nuked on the last page!

I pass universal anti-nuke laws, hill is up for the taking.

Could you people stop blowing up my neighbors?! You hit my planet's *moon*. Get yo facts straight!

Our planet with less and less neighbors.

They call galactic police. Police imprisons your homeworld for millenia.

The survived hill on a noone' planet.

I appeal to the intergalactic court, and they arrest the officers for corruption.

Our planet

I declare war on your planet

but wait, I'm only one person

OH NO MY ENTIRE COUNTRY IS ONLY ONE PERSON!!!! ME!!!!!!!

YOUR PLANET+MY COUNTRY

I build my own planet with a massive aerospace forse and offer to meet with [@DarkOwl57](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/161624-darkowl57/). He agrees the our governments would be stronger together.

Our Federation.

I accept [@ThaZeus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/148344-thazeus/)'s offer and we become a federation. Me, [@ThaZeus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/148344-thazeus/), and [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) all fight a war against [@StupidAndy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/171175-stupidandy/) which lasts about 5 minutes.

Our federation
Project destiny stops your planet's core's rotation. The resulting lack of a magnetic field causes everything to die and the atmosphere to perish. My big space rock.

My neighbors keep on dying.... Soon we'll have to move the planet out of this death zone...

Our worried planet

I come in peace as a psychiatrist to deal with all the worry. 

Our relaxed planet.

Too Late!

No one's hill.
My hill
I claim the cleansed world as my own.
Hill-billies get out from their hut and show you, whose the hill is.
